mapper.select: SELECT mining_district_id, name, ST_AsGeoJson( ST_WrapX(ST_Simplify(geog::GEOMETRY, 0.001), 0, 0 )::GEOGRAPHY, 3) AS geojson FROM mining_district ORDER BY LOWER(name)

SELECT DISTINCT md.mining_district_id, md.name FROM borehole AS bh JOIN borehole_geog AS bg ON bg.borehole_id = bh.borehole_id JOIN mining_district AS md ON ST_Intersects(md.geog, bg.geog) WHERE bh.prospect_id = #{prospect_id}
SELECT DISTINCT md.mining_district_id, md.name FROM borehole_geog AS bg JOIN mining_district AS md ON ST_Intersects(md.geog, bg.geog) WHERE bg.borehole_id = #{borehole_id}
